name: EcoPunk CITY LIMITS
description:
Spend some time in a polluted dystopian future city where robots are the filthy working class. 

After environmental collapse has reduced the supply of raw materials, you must find a way to save your fathers factory from financial ruin and keep yourself out of the scrap heap.

Delving into the theme of EcoPunk this game introduces concepts of a post-industrial city bound by capitalism, climate destruction and food shortages. A future society of great suffering and injustice with an evocative relationship between nature and machine.

It is great to Finally Finish this Demo with the Full Version to be released in the future!

Enjoy playing and please feel free to leave comments and feedback below.
